text: Darius Ciraco (born February 13, 1996) is a professional Canadian football offensive lineman for the Hamilton Tiger-Cats of the Canadian Football League (CFL). He was drafted sixth overall by the Tiger-Cats in the 2018 CFL Draft and signed with the team on May 22, 2018. He started all 18 regular season games and both playoff games in his first season and was named the Tiger-Cats' Most Outstanding Rookie. He played college football for the Calgary Dinos from 2014 to 2017. ==References== ==External links== *Hamilton Tiger-Cats bio Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Players of Canadian football from Ontario Category:Sportspeople from Burlington, Ontario Category:Canadian football offensive linemen Category:Hamilton Tiger-Cats players Category:Calgary Dinos football players
title: Darius Ciraco
